name: Diving Watch
summary: This sleek diving watch is ISO-certified with a 180-meter depth rating and automatic movement. It comes in three colors.
description: This sleek diving watch is ISO-certified with a 180-meter depth rating and automatic movement. It comes in three colors.

reviews.comment: Greatest purchase I have ever made in my life.
Absolutely love them! Can't stop wearing!

name: Dress Watch
summary: One of the slimmest upscale dress watches on the market, this one boasts the refinement and finishing that make this brand famous.

name: Military Watch
summary: Made for durability, this solar-powered watch has both analog and digital dials, ISO-standard shock resistance, and is water-resistant to 150 meters.
description: Made for durability, this solar-powered watch has both analog and digital dials, ISO-standard shock resistance, and is water-resistant to 150 meters.

name: Metallic Watch
summary: Whether you choose gold, platinum, or rose-gold, this beauty complements your wardrobe from a casual summer day out to your New Years office party.
description: Whether you choose gold, platinum, or rose-gold, this beauty complements your wardrobe from a casual summer day out to your New Years office party.

name: Wristwatch
summary: This trend-setting wristwatch will keep your look up to date for years to come. Choose the color that suites your personality and keep time in style.
